attributes.action: arrange for the immediate return of the so-called "Elgin" marbles to the Greek people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lord Elgin had no right to remove the marbles from Greece and the UK has no right to keep them, under any pretext. 

The marbles are the rightful property of Greece and it is not for the UK to act as some kind of self-appointed caretaker and decide whether or not Greece is capable of looking after its own heritage.  We have no right to these stolen items and should return them without further delay.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "arrange for the immediate return of the so-called "Elgin" marbles to the Greek people."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12858.asp

Prime Minister's Office
